meanings.definition: A decline in testosterone levels in aging men.
meanings.sent1: Andropause can cause fatigue and mood changes in older men.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather's doctor explained that andropause is a natural part of aging.
meanings.sent3: When my dad started experiencing andropause, he joked that he was becoming an old man.
meanings.sent4: The andropause of autumn leaves symbolizes the changing seasons of life.
meanings.sent5: The doctor recommended treatment to manage the symptoms of andropause.

meanings.sent1: Andropause is often accompanied by hot flashes and night sweats.
meanings.sent2: As men age, they may go through andropause, just like women experience menopause.
meanings.sent3: My uncle likes to tease that andropause is his body's way of preparing for retirement.
meanings.sent4: The andropause of the old car engine signaled the need for a tune-up.
meanings.sent5: Learning about andropause helped me understand my dad's health changes better.
